description: The "Squirrel.exe" binary that is part of multiple softwares (Slack, Teams, Discord...etc) can be used as a LOLBIN
name: Use of Squirrel.exe
query: (process.executable:*\\squirrel.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \-\-download\ * OR *\ \-\-update\ * OR *\ \-\-updateRollback\=*) AND process.command_line:*http*)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
